personal_info.name: Waheeb Edrees
personal_info.tagline: Student and research enthusiast exploring AI, coding, and technology
personal_info.current_status: currently learning, building projects, and diving into research
personal_info.about:
Hi there! I'm Waheeb Edrees, a student who enjoys exploring the world of artificial intelligence, coding, and technology. I'm passionate about learning, experimenting with new ideas, and building projects that help me grow and share knowledge with others.

My journey so far includes diving into areas like machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing, computer vision, and even cybersecurity automation. I'm still learning every day, but I love taking on challenges, asking big questions, and exploring how AI can make a real impact.

GitHub: waheebedrees
Website: waheebedrees.pythonanywhere.com
Location: somewhere in the AI research space
Status: always learning, always researching, always building

quotes_list: the question of whether a computer can think is no more interesting than the question of whether a submarine can swim. - edsger dijkstra
artificial intelligence is the new electricity. - andrew ng
in the world of cybersecurity, the only constant is change, and the only certainty is uncertainty. - cybersecurity wisdom
the best way to predict the future is to create it. - peter drucker
any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic. - arthur c. clarke
the real question is not whether machines think but whether men do. - b.f. skinner
security is not a product, but a process. - bruce schneier
quotes.personal_philosophy:
ai should enhance human capabilities while maintaining ethical boundaries.
 in cybersecurity, we build defenses by thinking like attackers.
 innovation comes from the intersection of curiosity and practical application.
